code: export const getDataById=function(storeName,id){let version=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:1;return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const request=indexedDB.open("myDB",1);request.onsuccess=()=>{const db=request.result;const transaction=db.transaction(storeName,"readonly");const store=transaction.objectStore(storeName);const getRequest=store.get(id);getRequest.onsuccess=()=>{if(getRequest.result){resolve(getRequest.result);}else{resolve(null);}};getRequest.onerror=error=>{reject(error);};};request.onerror=error=>{reject(error);};});};
